com.github.sworisbreathing.sfmf4j.api

Interface FileMonitorService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CommonsIOFileMonitorServiceImpl, WatchServiceFileMonitorServiceImpl, WatchServiceFileMonitorServiceImpl

    public interface FileMonitorService
    A file monitor service.
    Author:
    Steven Swor

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void initialize()
      Initializes the file monitor service.
      boolean isMonitoringDirectory(File directory)
      Determines if the service is monitoring a given directory.
      void registerDirectoryListener(File directory, DirectoryListener directoryListener)
      Registers interest in receiving notifications when a directory's contents have changed.
      void shutdown()
      Shuts down the file monitor service.
      void unregisterDirectoryListener(File directory, DirectoryListener directoryListener)
      Unregisters interest in receiving notifications when a directory's contents have changed.
